channel.title: Compile error
channel.description:
when i ever I click compile this is what comes up..
You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. Finished! Press any key to continue . . .
Do i need to edit something... like click edit on it cuz i got jdk 22 and everything. this is what comes up when i right click and click edit.
@echo off if exist "%programfiles%\(x86) Jre6" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit

item.title: Compile error

item.description:
@runyluny wrote:

what exactly does that mean?

item.title: Compile error

item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

You must have JDK and Environmental Variables fixed and configured.

item.title: Compile error
item.dc:creator: @runyluny runyluny
item.description:
@runyluny wrote:

when i ever I click compile this is what comes up…

You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to
load.
Finished!
Press any key to continue . . .

Do i need to edit something… like click edit on it cuz i got jdk 22 and everything. this is what comes up when i right click and click edit.

@echo off
if exist “%programfiles%(x86) Jre6” (call :compile “%programfiles%\Java”) else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load.
“%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe” http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp
:end
echo Finished!
pause
exit

Read full topic
